name: Breaking In
description:
Being a supernatural investigator, you devoted most of your time to investigating paranormal entities and cyprids. However, you got a lead in a certain supernatural case. A office building appears to hide something paranormal and evil.

By Breaking Into the office at night, you decided to risk it all to find out the truth.

-----------

This is a SCREAM Gamejam submission. Updates will be made to the game but the original one (this one) will always be available to download

Controls:

WASD to look around

Left Click to interact with things

Right-Click to Sprinkle Salt (If you have any)

E to open inventory
